description: Global description: This entity contains a harmonised geographic description of a beach.

contents.name: beachType
contents.description: Type of beach according to different criteria. Enum:'whiteSand, urban, isolated, calmWaters, blueFlag, Q-Quality, strongWaves, windy, blackSand'. Or any other value needed by an application.
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: occupationRate
contents.description: Typical occupation rate of this beach. Enum:'low, medium, high'

contents.name: facilities
contents.description: Describes different facilities offered by this beach. Enum:'promenade, showers, cleaningServices, lifeGuard, sunshadeRental, sunLoungerRental, waterCraftRental, toilets, touristOffice, litterBins, telephone,surfPracticeArea, accessforDisabled'
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: accessType
contents.description: Enum:'privateVehicle, boat, onFoot, publicTransport'. Describes how to get to this beach.
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: areaServed
contents.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: refSeeAlso
contents.description: List of comma separated URLs to one or more related entities.
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.
